def_cn: 在…交叉往返;纵横交错于
def_en: If a person or thing criss-crosses an area, they travel from one side to the other and back again many times, following different routes. If a number of things criss-cross an area, they cross it, and cross over each other.

def_cn: (两组线或事物)相互交叉，相互交错
def_en: If two sets of lines or things criss-cross, they cross over each other.

def_cn: (图案或设计)纵横交错的，十字交叉的
def_en: A criss-cross pattern or design consists of lines crossing each other.
